name: color
description: The color of the progress bar. It can be any valid CSS color or registered color role.

name: backgroundColor
description: The background color of the progress bar. It can be any valid CSS color or registered color role.

name: indeterminate
description: Determines if the progress bar is indeterminate.

name: max
description: The maximum value of the progress bar.

name: size
description: The size of the progress bar.

name: value
description: The current value of the progress bar.
